alert.note: Alert for Polk (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 30 at 10:10AM CDT until June 05 at 4:00PM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Grand Forks ND has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Minnesota... Red Lake River at Crookston affecting Polk County. .With rainfall anticipated from today into Tuesday, river levels will be on the rise along the Red Lake River. The river is expected to reach Minor flood stage by mid to late week. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM WEDNESDAY MORNING TO SUNDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Red Lake River at Crookston. * WHEN...From Wednesday morning to Sunday afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 16.0 feet, Public Works begins 24 hour monitoring of pumps, gates, and valves. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:45 AM CDT Monday the stage was 10.1 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late Wednesday morning to a crest of 17.0 feet early Thursday afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage late Saturday morning. - Flood stage is 15.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Safety message - Turn around, don`t drown. Don`t travel through flooded areas. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
